title: Santana - VH1 - 1999 - Hard Rock Live
description:
Here is a nice bootleg. Check my account for more classic bootlegs. 

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed :)


VH-1 Presents:

Santana
Hard Rock Live
1999

01. Back Story with a history of Carlos
02. (Da Le) Yaleo
03. Love Of My Life (w/ Dave Mathews)
04. Put Your Lights On (w/ Everlast)
05. Backstory additional history of Carlos
06. Maria Maria (w/ Brothers B&G)
07. Black Magic Woman > (commercial break spliced out the best this deck allowed)
08. Oyo Como Va (talk over during final credits)

01. Oyo Como Va (from repeat airing with no talk over)
[44 min]



G-Spot Analysis:

System: NTSC
Format: DVD VOB
Video Codec: MPEG2 
Video Resolution: 720X480
Video Framerate: 29.97 FPS
Video BitRate: 5125 Kbps 
Aspect Ratio: 4:3
Audio Stream: LPCM in beautiful hi quality stereo


source:
Cable TV > Mitsubishi HS U-650 VHS Hi Fi
Transfer:
Sony VHS Hi Fi > Toshiba RD XS-35 Stand Alone Hard Drive/DVD burner (with simple editing functions-chapter marks in appropriate places)


Chapter breaks are not perfect and sometimes a blip of the commercial is there.
The initial airing of the show had a voice over during the final credit while the song was still playing.
An additional version of that last segment was recorded from a repeat airing and has no voice over.
The volume on the second version is much louder than the first and is in a seperate folder.

I really don't think the voice over will bother you much but I am so picky.
If you have good video editing skills please feel free to re-do this and splice the final 2 songs together.
Just request that you give credit to this source and leave the audio in LPCM mode.
And please share it here so I can get the improved version.

For historical reference only and not intended for resale or any commercial use.

Enjoy
-M- (Feb. 2016)
Flying M Productions


Fan Recordings for Collectors
Trade Freely But Please Do Not Sell
